title: SO EVEERYONE PLZ CHECK THIS OUT I GOT BAN FOR THIS
body:
THIS IS THE EMAIL I GOT FROM RIOT GAMES SUPPORT ON THE REASON I GOT BAN PERMANENTLY OFF THERE GAME


Eric Matth  
Eric Matthews, 
Good Looking Detective (Riot Games Player Support) 

Apr 20, 4:29 PM PDT 


Hey again,

These are the lines that are considered to be negative towards other players that did trigger this permanent suspension.

[2:22] [All] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): sona just ran off lol elft me
 [2:24] [All] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): hahahahaah
 [2:38] [All] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): lol nothing i coudl do

[3:58] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): idc
 [4:10] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): ypur not doing anything
 [4:14] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): guys look at sona right now

I know it's not much, but this was weighed heavily against your favor since your 2-week suspension and I will have to uphold our decision.

I don't mean to be blunt, but if there are no other concerns, I will need to close this ticket.

ᕕ( ᐛ )ᕗ
Eric Matthews, 
 Good Looking Detective

replies.body:
Hello!

I am locking this thread since the original thread is still active there's no need for another one. Please refer to the original thread [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/9yWkOo66-this-is-what-i-got-permanently-ban-for-unreal) for continued discussions. Thank you!


If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [Boards Moderation Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/qVlculPP-boards-moderation-discord)
* The [Discuss the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board


~KittySuppSquad {{sticker:sona-playing}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Here is a thread where the OP posted the other part of the chat log along with the response from Riot support.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/9yWkOo66-this-is-what-i-got-permanently-ban-for-unreal

I don't see a chance at real discussion given the OP's responses in that thread.

Edit:

> [{quoted}](name=THAPaNzEE1,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=b5B1e5uZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-22T00:23:52.418+0000)
>
> IF YOU VOTE YES U PROBABLY  WORK OR ARE ASSOCIATTED WITH RIOT GAMES NO OFFENSE TO ANYONE

Case in point.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=b5B1e5uZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-22T00:24:37.343+0000)
>
> Here is a thread where the OP posted the other part of the chat log along with the response from Riot support.
> 
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/9yWkOo66-this-is-what-i-got-permanently-ban-for-unreal
> 
> I don't see a chance at real discussion given the OP's responses in that thread.
> 
> Edit:
> 
> Case in point.

PLZ STOP COMMENTING JUST TO TALK TRASH ON WHAT I SAY THATS NOT COOL

I just don't believe that this is going to go anywhere constructive. You've already made a thread on your punishment. You've had plenty of discussion and people giving their opinion on the ban.

Then you start this one off by removing important information and declaring that anyone that believes it to be a valid punishment to be a Riot employee.

first off why are your following my account for weeks on end ive never posted to the board ever these are my first 2 posts ever on the board an your getting mad cause im posting on the thread where you have discussions an I haven't removed anything these are 2 different posts about the chat logs I did an this ones about riots player support so how is this the same post

I was unaware about the thread I linked until I checked your profile.

I click on your name, then I can see what threads you've created. Anyone can do this for any board user. I usually do this when someone posts a response from support because they sometimes have already had a discussion about their chat-logs earlier. In this case you did.

I posted this to show what riot support said to me 

my other post was my chat logs,
 not the reason for me being ban off the game by riot so your wrong maybe you should read peoples posts an look at the times there posted

Then you probably shouldn't be asking whether or not it was a valid punishment, because your entire chat logs are needed for an informed opinion on that.

If you wanted to make a thread only about the ticket and not the ban don't include a poll specifically about the ban.
I posted my chat logs they sent me in this post for the reason I got ban did you not even read this post

You posted your full chat logs in the previous thread. The only thing you posted now was the support's response, leaving out the full logs.

And I'm done, I'm not going to sit here and argue with you when I think there's little chance of you getting the point I'm trying to make.

now go look at when that post was updated when I posted this thread I reply to everyone  that commented on  there with the email I got sent but this post is about riot support on the reason they said I got ban coming straight from them so go read the chat logs an tell me how this email says I got ban for whats in this post not the previous post you claim are the same

the same thread is 5 days old. people already told you there, the 14 day ban is your last warning. ANY misbehavior will get you permabanned at that point.
im not sure why you created the same post again, but the answers wont differ.
get over it and grow up man.

so what your saying is that its not ok to laugh an say lol (laughing out loud) an hahaha an have a good time at the game or you get ban off of it now this is the reason I got ban off the game that previous post has nothing to do with what they said to me coming from the ticket I sent them i just got this email from them an this was the reason i got ban from there player support now read it all 


 Eric Matth  
Eric Matthews, 
Good Looking Detective (Riot Games Player Support) 

Apr 20, 4:29 PM PDT 


Hey again,

These are the lines that are considered to be negative towards other players that did trigger this permanent suspension.

[2:22] [All] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): sona just ran off lol elft me
 [2:24] [All] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): hahahahaah
 [2:38] [All] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): lol nothing i coudl do

[3:58] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): idc
 [4:10] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): ypur not doing anything
 [4:14] THAPaNzEE1 (Jinx): guys look at sona right now

I know it's not much, but this was weighed heavily against your favor since your 2-week suspension and I will have to uphold our decision.

I don't mean to be blunt, but if there are no other concerns, I will need to close this ticket.

ᕕ( ᐛ )ᕗ
Eric Matthews, 
 Good Looking Detective

> [{quoted}](name=Arammus,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=b5B1e5uZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-04-22T00:26:20.061+0000)
>
> the same thread is 5 days old. people already told you there, the 14 day ban is your last warning. ANY misbehavior will get you permabanned at that point.
> im not sure why you created the same post again, but the answers wont differ.
> get over it and grow up man.

FIRST OFF THIS IS A DIFFERENT POST ,ITS THE RESPONSE I GOT FROM THEM SO WHY DONT YOU PLZ STOP TALKING TRASH TO ME

This honestly reminds me a lot of [this thread.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/E4LnThmW-most-ridiculous-chat-restriction-i-have-ever-seen-in-my-life)  I don't bandwagon, so I won't make any conclusions until I see some hard evidence, like screenshots of the chat log to make sure no tampering happened and maybe even a comment from someone who actually knows.

EDIT:  Read the other thread this guy made, he's guilty.
Just because what broke the cammels back was a piece of straw, it doesn't make its back any less broken.
YOU GUYS SHOULD READ THE CHAT I POSTED AN HAVE COMPASSION FOR SOMEONE WHOS BEING WRONGED BY CYBER BULLING
AEROWAFFLE I DONT KNOW WHO HE IS DONT TAKE HIS BAIT
